description: This file sets up a knowledge base and an agent for querying a PDF document about Thai recipes, using various external libraries and models.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class for the Gemini language model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for vector database operations using pgvector.

classes.name: GeminiEmbedder
classes.description: A class for embedding text using the Gemini model.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or recreates the knowledge base.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent to a query.
